mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select seq, prdtCode, id, subject, content, good, whereToBuy, ref, lev, step, pseq, reply, hit, to_char(logtime, 'YYYY.MM.DD') as logtime from afterBoard where prdtCode = #{prdtCode} order by ref desc, step asc)tt) where rn >= #{startNum} and rn <= #{endNum}
mapper.insert: insert into afterBoard values(seq_afterBoard.nextval, #{prdtCode}, #{id}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{good}, #{whereToBuy}, seq_afterBoard.currval, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, sysdate)
